page.title: 11KING STERNDALE VILLAGE
page.content: In the village, the only occupations available are in farming. Most of the villagers work in the nearby quarries or they travel outside our 'block' to work. They go to work in their cars; {there is no public {transport at all.}The people who haven't got cars rely on their neighbours. {There are no shops in the {village, not even a little corner {shop or a post office.}There is one telephone box opposite Green Farm.Most of the villagers do their shopping in Buxton once a week. There is no playing area for children. At the moment, there is an enquiry being conducted about{Tarmac {Quarry's plans to extend its workings. The villagers don't want the face to be only 50 feet from the ends of their gardens.
